tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE employee_training_materials (
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_id INT NOT NULL,
    material_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    progress INT,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE EmployeeTrainingProgress ( 
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    employee_id INT, 
    material_id INT, 
    completion_status BOOLEAN, 
    progress_date TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE employee_training_progress (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  material_id INT,
  progress FLOAT,
  completed_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  join_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_training_materials (
    training_material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(255),
    material_description TEXT,
    material_url VARCHAR(255),
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE employee_training_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    training_material_id INT,
    progress_percentage INT,
    completed_date DATE,
    created_at TIMESTAMP,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255),
    department VARCHAR(255),
    manager_id INT,
    hire_date DATE
);
